thread.title: Indianapolis Colts Linebacker Edwin Jackson Killed on Highway

author: wsjcom
title: Indianapolis Colts Linebacker Edwin Jackson Killed on Highway
text:
INDIANAPOLIS—Indianapolis Colts linebacker Edwin Jackson was one of two men killed Sunday when a suspected drunken driver struck them along a highway in Indianapolis.
The Colts said in a statement Sunday that the team is “heartbroken” by Mr. Jackson’s death. The 26-year-old “was loved by all in the Colts organization,” the Colts said.
